img_summary: The image depicts the "Aged Ginseng," an uncommon ingredient in the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. It is described as a small, thin plant found in Black Wind Mountain and onwards. Players can also purchase it from the Shrine store after saving the Shen Monkey Vendor in Black Wind Mountain. The item is likely used for crafting or other in-game purposes.
